sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import Text from '../../components/Text/Text';
import Heading from '../../components/Heading/Heading';
import Type from '../../components/Type/Type';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"typography"}}>{`Typography`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`For usage in React, see the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"/components/heading"}}>{`Heading`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"/components/text"}}>{`Text`}</MDXTag>{` in the
component guidelines section.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"headings"}}>{`Headings`}</MDXTag>
<Type size="small" component={Heading} name="heading"/>
<Type size="normal" component={Heading} name="heading"/>
<Type size="big" component={Heading} name="heading"/>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"text"}}>{`Text`}</MDXTag>
<Type size="small" component={Text} name="text"/>
<Type size="normal" component={Text} name="text"/>
<Type size="big" component={Text} name="text"/>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"font-weights"}}>{`Font weights`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Plurall UI has one font weights, regular and bold. You can only toggle the
boldness of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Text`}</MDXTag>{` but not `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Heading`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<Type size="normal" bold component={Text} fontWeight="bold" name="text"/>
<Type size="normal" component={Text} fontWeight="regular" name="text"/>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"best-practices"}}>{`Best practices`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Do not directly use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`theme.typography`}</MDXTag>{` settings, but rather use the
specialized components `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Heading`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Text`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
